HEAP SAFETY AUDIT - ALX NOVA CONTROLLER DSP PIPELINE
=====================================================

CRITICAL FINDINGS SUMMARY:
1. No error propagation when dsp_delay_alloc_slot\(\) returns -1
2. No error propagation when dsp_fir_alloc_slot\(\) returns -1
3. heapCritical flag never checked before DSP allocations
4. Delay allocations \(38.4 KB\) dwarf critical threshold \(20 KB\)
5. Only FIR import has proper error handling - all others fail silently
6. WebSocket client receives no error notifications
7. REST API returns HTTP 200 on allocation failures
8. Broken stages silently skip audio processing

ENDOFREPORT)
